A publick tryal of the Quakers in Barmudas [sic] upon the first day of May, 1678 by Samson Bond, late the preacher of the Gospel in Barmudas. Bond, Samson.
[2], 100 [i.e. 104] p.
Printed by Samuel Green upon assignment of Samuel Sewell, Boston : 1682.
Pages 99-104 incorrectly numbered. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
